title: Zenity expands AI security platform with incident intelligence and agentic browser protection
description: Zenity expanded its AI security platform with incident-correlation intelligence, broader agentic browser coverage, and a new open-source tool for testing emerging LLM manipulation techniques. As organizations adopt AI agents, AI assistants and agentic browser…
